Mr. Speaker, as flooding becomes more frequent due to the climate  crisis, it is crucial that we take action to require FEMA to provide  flood victims with the full resources that they need to rebuild their  lives.

I still remember the senior in Inkster, Michigan. She was in her  seventies, Mr. Speaker. After the first…
